jobPostings.title: Software Engineers
jobPostings.description: You'll be a contributor to all levels of our software design and development. You'll interface directly with senior managers (CTO and Development Managers) and at times with our clients to understand the problem and build elegant solutions. You'll work on feature development, testing, bug fixing, maintenance, and support.

jobPostings.title: Sr Dev Backend Architect
jobPostings.description: You have experience developing and architecting multi-tenant, cloud-based B2B applications. You have worked on real-time, distributed, messaging-based systems, and are still hands-on in those areas. You deeply understand the security and performance designs for a system with a large user base hitting both an API and web front-end end-points, with client updates needed in real-time at very low latency.

jobPostings.title: Software Engineer (FIX-Protocol Specialist)
jobPostings.description: You have experience working in the financial industry, with extensive focus on writing code to interact with external platforms via the Financial Information eXchange (FIX) protocol. You are excited about expanding our products coverage with external venues and coordinating with providers to manage working relationships.

jobPostings.title: Clinical Research Coordinator
jobPostings.description: We are seeking a Clinical Research Coordinator to join our team in Birmingham, AL. The ideal candidate will have experience in coordinating clinical trials and managing study protocols.

jobPostings.title: Data Scientist
jobPostings.description: We are looking for a Data Scientist to work remotely with our team. The candidate should have a strong background in data analysis and machine learning.

jobPostings.title: Scientist, Protein Chemistry R&D
jobPostings.description: Apply for the Scientist, Protein Chemistry R&D position at Amide.

jobPostings.title: Research Associate - Peptide Chemistry R&D
jobPostings.description: Apply for the Research Associate - Peptide Chemistry R&D position at Amide.

jobPostings.title: Sales Director
jobPostings.description: Apply for the Sales Director position at Amide.
